edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.graph.parser

Class GraphMLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.graph.parser.GraphMLParser

  • public class GraphMLParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses a text file and creates a Graph from it. Allows for graph-to-editor and editor-to-graph manipulation.
    Author:
    Ty Devries
